testcase.classname: User able to select filtered product
testcase.name: User will select filtered product and verifying the added product in trolley or not
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Homepage...................................................passed When User selected "women"..................................................passed And User selected "Jewellery and watches" in category.......................passed And User selected "£10 - £15" in price......................................passed And User selected "Moon & Back" in brands...................................passed And Add filtered Product to basket..........................................passed Then Verify the product in trolley..........................................passed
